home_tiles.title: Holiday Programme
home_tiles.content: We're running a holiday programme in the Term 2 break!

home_tiles.title: Ice Age Movie Fundraiser
home_tiles.content: Come and watch Ice Age at the state-of-the-art HCG movie theatre. Set up your own seating from all of our gym matting, lie back, and enjoy Ice Age projected onto the gym wall.

home_tiles.title: 5 & 6 Year Old Classes
home_tiles.content: We currently have open spaces in our recreational gymnastics classes for 5 & 6 year olds!

splash_subtitle: At Harbour City Gymnatics we offer gymnastics programmes for all ages and abilities.
contact_subtitle: Send us your questions about what you're after, or express interest in enrolling in a class.
